name: Giant Eagle
languages: understands Common and Auran but can't speak them

traits.Keen Sight: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Multiattack: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Talons: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
